verses.verse: וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- shall be when תָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo And it shall be when thou [art] come in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, unto the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לְךָ֖ le-Cha נַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah; thee [for] an inheritance וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֖הּ <S%H3423><s%> vi-rish-Tah and possessest וְיָשַׁ֥בְתָּ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-Shav-ta it and dwellest בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.

וְלָקַחְתָּ֞ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta That thou shalt take מֵרֵאשִׁ֣ית׀ <S%H7225><s%> me-re-Shit of the first כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> pe-Ri of all the fruit הָאֲדָמָ֗ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, of the earth אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תָּבִ֧יא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vi which thou shalt bring מֵֽאַרְצְךָ֛ <S%H776><s%> me-'ar-tze-Cha of thy land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לָ֖ךְ lach וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ta thee and shalt put בַטֶּ֑נֶא <S%H2935><s%> vat-Te-ne; [it] in a basket וְהָֽלַכְתָּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> ve-ha-lach-Ta and shalt go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom, unto the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִבְחַר֙ <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> le-shak-Ken to place שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. in it

וּבָאתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> u-va-Ta And thou shalt go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, unto the priest אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> bai-ya-Mim that shall be in those days הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem; like וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him הִגַּ֤דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> hig-Gad-ti unto him I profess הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> hai-yOm this day לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for בָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> va-ti that I am come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, unto the country אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' sware יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-nu unto our fathers לָ֥תֶת <S%H5414><s%> La-tet for to give לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

וְלָקַ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-Kach shall take הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen And the priest הַטֶּ֖נֶא <S%H2935><s%> hat-Te-ne the basket מִיָּדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-De-cha; out of thine hand וְהִ֨נִּיח֔וֹ <S%H3240><s%> ve-Hin-ni-Cho, and set it down לִפְנֵ֕י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before מִזְבַּ֖ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach the altar יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. thy God

וְעָנִ֨יתָ <S%H6030><s%> ve-'a-Ni-ta And thou shalt speak וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say לִפְנֵ֣י׀ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God אֲרַמִּי֙ <S%H761><s%> 'a-ram-Mi A Syrian אֹבֵ֣ד <S%H6><s%> 'o-Ved ready to perish אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi, [was] my father וַיֵּ֣רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red and he went down מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ray-mah, into Egypt וַיָּ֥גָר <S%H1481><s%> vai-Ya-gor and sojourned שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there בִּמְתֵ֣י <S%H4462><s%> bim-Tei Memucan מְעָ֑ט <S%H4592><s%> me-'At; a few וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- became שָׁ֕ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there לְג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> le-Goy and became there a nation גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol great עָצ֥וּם <S%H6099><s%> 'a-Tzum mighty וָרָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> va-Rav. and populous

וַיָּרֵ֧עוּ <S%H7489><s%> vai-ya-Re-'u evil entreated אֹתָ֛נוּ <S%H854><s%> 'o-Ta-nu for הַמִּצְרִ֖ים <S%H4713><s%> ham-mitz-Rim And the Egyptians וַיְעַנּ֑וּנוּ <S%H6031><s%> vay-'an-Nu-nu; us and afflicted וַיִּתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu us and laid עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu and עֲבֹדָ֥ה <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dah bondage קָשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7186><s%> ka-Shah. upon us hard

וַנִּצְעַ֕ק <S%H6817><s%> van-nitz-'Ak And when we cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-nu; of our fathers וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קֹלֵ֔נוּ <S%H6963><s%> ko-Le-nu, our voice וַיַּ֧רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar and looked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עָנְיֵ֛נוּ <S%H6040><s%> 'a-ne-Ye-nu on our affliction וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עֲמָלֵ֖נוּ <S%H5999><s%> 'a-ma-Le-nu and our labour וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et לַחֲצֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3906><s%> la-cha-Tze-nu. and our oppression

וַיּוֹצִאֵ֤נוּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-tzi-'E-nu brought us forth יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt בְּיָ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad hand חֲזָקָה֙ <S%H2389><s%> cha-za-Kah with a mighty וּבִזְרֹ֣עַ <S%H2220><s%> u-viz-Ro-a' arm נְטוּיָ֔ה <S%H5186><s%> ne-tu-Yah, and with an outstretched וּבְמֹרָ֖א <S%H4172><s%> u-ve-mo-Ra terribleness גָּדֹ֑ל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol; and with great וּבְאֹת֖וֹת <S%H226><s%> u-ve-'o-Tot and with signs וּבְמֹפְתִֽים׃ <S%H4159><s%> u-ve-mo-fe-Tim. and with wonders

וַיְבִאֵ֖נוּ <S%H935><s%> vay-vi-'E-nu And he hath brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom us into this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; to this וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-ten- and hath given לָ֙נוּ֙ la-nu אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz us this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz [even] a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> za-Vat that floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash. and honey

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold הֵבֵ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> he-Ve-ti And now behold I have brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֵאשִׁית֙ <S%H7225><s%> re-Shit the first פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> pe-Ri of the produce הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, of the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נָתַ֥תָּה <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-tah hast given לִּ֖י li יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; which thou O LORD וְהִנַּחְתּ֗וֹ <S%H3240><s%> ve-hin-nach-To, me And thou shalt set לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei it before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֔יתָ <S%H7812><s%> ve-hish-ta-cha-Vi-ta, and worship לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. thy God

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֣ <S%H8056><s%> ve-sa-mach-Ta glad בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol- all הַטּ֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> hat-Tov, in every good אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> na-tan- hath given לְךָ֛ le-Cha יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [thing] which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God וּלְבֵיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> u-le-vei-Te-cha; unto thee and unto thine house אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah and you וְהַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-le-Vi, thou and the Levite וְהַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> ve-hag-Ger and the stranger אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Be-cha. that [is] among ס sa-Mek

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki When תְכַלֶּ֞ה <S%H3615><s%> te-chal-Leh When thou hast made an end לַ֠עְשֵׂר <S%H6237><s%> La'-ser of tithing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מַעְשַׂ֧ר <S%H4643><s%> ma'-Sar all the tithes תְּבוּאָתְךָ֛ <S%H8393><s%> te-vu-'a-te-Cha of thine increase בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah year הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֖ת <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shit the third שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> she-Nat [which is] the year הַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֑ר <S%H4643><s%> ham-ma-'a-Ser; of tithing וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Tah and hast given לַלֵּוִ֗י <S%H3881><s%> lal-le-Vi, [it] unto the Levite לַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> lag-Ger the stranger לַיָּת֣וֹם <S%H3490><s%> lai-ya-Tom the fatherless וְלָֽאַלְמָנָ֔ה <S%H490><s%> ve-la-'al-ma-Nah, and the widow וְאָכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-che-Lu that they may eat בִשְׁעָרֶ֖יךָ <S%H8179><s%> vish-'a-Rei-cha within thy gates וְשָׂבֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H7646><s%> ve-sa-Ve-'u. and be filled

וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta Then thou shalt say לִפְנֵי֩ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בִּעַ֧רְתִּי <S%H1197><s%> bi-'Ar-ti I have brought away הַקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh the hallowed things מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- any הַבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit, out of [mine] house וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and also נְתַתִּ֤יו <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Tiv and also have given לַלֵּוִי֙ <S%H3881><s%> lal-le-Vi them unto the Levite וְלַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> ve-lag-Ger and unto the stranger לַיָּת֣וֹם <S%H3490><s%> lai-ya-Tom to the fatherless וְלָאַלְמָנָ֔ה <S%H490><s%> ve-la-'al-ma-Nah, and to the widow כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ke-chol- to all מִצְוָתְךָ֖ <S%H4687><s%> mitz-va-te-Cha according to all thy commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוִּיתָ֑נִי <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Ta-ni; which thou hast commanded לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not עָבַ֥רְתִּי <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Var-ti me I have not transgressed מִמִּצְוֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H4687><s%> mi-mitz-vo-Tei-cha thy commandments וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃ <S%H7911><s%> sha-Cha-che-ti. neither have I forgotten

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor אָכַ֨לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> 'a-Chal-ti I have not eaten בְאֹנִ֜י <S%H205><s%> ve-'o-Ni thereof in my mourning מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu, any וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor בִעַ֤רְתִּי <S%H1197><s%> vi-'Ar-ti neither have I taken away מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu any בְּטָמֵ֔א <S%H2931><s%> be-ta-Me, [ought] thereof for [any] unclean וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti [use] nor given מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu any לְמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> le-Met; [ought] thereof for the dead שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti, [but] I have hearkened בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> be-kOl to the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai, my God עָשִׂ֕יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti [and] have done כְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you צִוִּיתָֽנִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Ta-ni. according to all that thou hast commanded

הַשְׁקִיפָה֩ <S%H8259><s%> hash-ki-Fah Look down מִמְּע֨וֹן <S%H4583><s%> mi-me-'on habitation קָדְשְׁךָ֜ <S%H6944><s%> kod-she-cha from thy holy מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, from heaven וּבָרֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> u-va-Rech and bless אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמְּךָ֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha thy people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, and the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֖תָּה <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-tah which thou hast given לָ֑נוּ La-nu; כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba'-ta us as thou swarest לַאֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-nu, unto our fathers אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> za-Vat that floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash. and honey ס sa-Mek

הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom This day הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, This יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God מְצַוְּךָ֧ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha hath commanded לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot thee to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֻקִּ֥ים <S%H2706><s%> ha-chuk-Kim these statutes הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֑ים <S%H4941><s%> ham-mish-pa-Tim; and judgments וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֤ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-mar-Ta thou shalt therefore keep וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta and do אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha them with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-cha. and with all thy soul

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD הֶאֱמַ֖רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> he-'e-Mar-ta Thou hast avouched הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; this day לִהְיוֹת֩ <S%H1961><s%> lih-yOt become לְךָ֨ le-Cha לֵֽאלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him to be thy God וְלָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> ve-la-Le-chet walk בִּדְרָכָ֗יו <S%H1870><s%> bid-ra-Chav, in his ways וְלִשְׁמֹ֨ר <S%H8104><s%> ve-lish-Mor and to keep חֻקָּ֧יו <S%H2706><s%> chuk-Kav his statutes וּמִצְוֹתָ֛יו <S%H4687><s%> u-mitz-vo-Tav and his commandments וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-pa-Tav and his judgments וְלִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> ve-lish-Mo-a' and to hearken בְּקֹלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Lo. unto his voice

וַֽיהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD הֶאֱמִֽירְךָ֣ <S%H559><s%> he-'e-mi-re-Cha hath avouched הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, thee this day לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot become לוֹ֙ lo לְעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am people סְגֻלָּ֔ה <S%H5459><s%> se-gul-Lah, to be his peculiar כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dib-ber- as he hath promised לָ֑ךְ Lach; וְלִשְׁמֹ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> ve-lish-Mor thee and that [thou] shouldest keep כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מִצְוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tav. all his commandments

וּֽלְתִתְּךָ֣ <S%H5414><s%> u-le-tit-te-Cha And to make עֶלְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon, thee high עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim above all nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah, which he hath made לִתְהִלָּ֖ה <S%H8416><s%> lit-hil-Lah in praise וּלְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> u-le-Shem and in name וּלְתִפְאָ֑רֶת <S%H8597><s%> u-le-tif-'A-ret; and in honour וְלִֽהְיֹתְךָ֧ <S%H1961><s%> ve-lih-yo-te-Cha become עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- people קָדֹ֛שׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Dosh and that thou mayest be an holy לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber. as he hath spoken ס sa-Mek
